original_title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - The Forest
overview: Laurie Anderson presents Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds. The Forest is the second in a series of six lectures, looking at the challenges we face as artists and citizens as we reinvent our culture with ambiguity and beauty. This talk will consider place­ – visual and spatial sound.
title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - The Forest
